title: No stored list shown when tapping on a saved cache

labels.name: Unverified
labels.description: Issue not yet confirmed/reproduced or feature requests not yet checked for plausibility

body:
### Describe your problem!

From support mail.
A video (with permission of user) tells more than words:
https://files.droescher.eu/public/no_stored_list.mp4

Pay attention to the fact, that the popup does not show any list where the cache is stored (while it is stored).

If you look closely, it seems to be a performance / device issue as each tapped cache disappears and reappears and it seems during this time all other caches will falsely report, that they are not on a list.


### How to reproduce?

see video

### Actual result after these steps?

_No response_

### Expected result after these steps?

_No response_

### Reproducible

Unclear

### c:geo Version

2021.10.08

### System information
